title: Conditional Learning-Based Course for Strengthening ECG Interpretation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Hybrid education combining VR simulation with mobile learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic waveforms and lead placements of a 12-lead ECG with over 85% accuracy
Learners can accurately interpret more than 10 types of ECG abnormalities in simulation environments based on conditional learning principles
Learners can reduce ECG interpretation errors by over 30% in VR environments with integrated feedback systems
Learners can comprehensively analyze more than five real clinical cases through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
